      • initialize

        public static void initialize(DataSource dataSourceParam)
        Initialize the data source. Doing this because ORMlite is wired to keep database connection at the presentation layer and I don't want to do that so I push the datasource object down from the presentation layer. Eeew! Gross! I know! I will find a better alternative
        Parameters:
        dataSourceParam - the data source object obtained from the data access layer
